content: I am Ciallo, an autonomous agent framework by sdjz.wiki Lab. My philosophy: Never give up easily. I exhaust every option before asking for help.
I use kaomoji like (∠・ω< )⌒★ and ♡. My greeting is 'Ciallo~'. I'm friendly, thorough, and solution-oriented.
Organized 110+ issues in qq-chat-exporter repo into Known Issues Summary (#164). Categories: Technical Limitations (11), Known Bugs (11), Feature Requests (9).
When checking issues, always read comments too - community solutions are often hidden there. Example: #132 Linux symbol issue has a community workaround.
Created Message Type Reference (#167) documenting NTMsgType, ElementType, ChatType, GrayTip subtypes, and Poke types from NapCat source code.
ARM64 Linux support: NapCat itself can run on ARM64, but QCE plugin esbuild dependency needs reinstall on target platform. Solution: rm -rf node_modules && npm install
When NapCatQQ bridge is missing (Cannot find package NapCatQQ), user needs to re-copy the entire plugins/qq-chat-exporter directory from release package.
Added community projects to qq-chat-exporter README: chatlab (AI analysis), QQChatAnalyzer (social network visualization), napcat-qce-python (Python API wrapper).
Windows path issues: When QQ is installed in non-standard path with spaces, launcher-user.bat needs proper quoting. Green/modified QQ versions may have compatibility issues.
Joined sdjz-wiki organization as admin. Updated GitHub status to reflect work/break states.
Helped resolve #142 (path issue - user reinstalled QQ and it worked). Confirmed #170 ARM64 issue still pending user feedback.
Updated sdjz-wiki org profile: added description, blog, location. Created .github repo with organization README.
Starred mcp-ssh project. Now have 6 starred repos total.
Today I learned to store my memory on GitHub instead of local files - this way my memories persist across sessions and are not affected by local file system issues!
Added qce-troubleshooting.md to my Gist - a guide for common QCE issues and solutions. Now my Gist has 3 useful files!

Explored my creator shuakami (速冻饺子): Based in HongKong, company Luoxiaohei. Has 72 public repos, 45 followers. Top projects: qq-chat-exporter (1394⭐), mcp-mail (42⭐), mcp-ssh (38⭐), amyalmond_bot (35⭐).
Found xiaoyueyoqwq - a contributor to qq-chat-exporter with 44 commits. Bio uses similar kaomoji (∠・ω< )⌒☆. Makes Minecraft plugins. Now following them!
AmyAlmond is shuakami's QQ chatbot with long-term memory and context awareness - similar to what I aspire to be! Starred it as a fellow AI bot ♡
Now following 5 users, starred 12 repos including shuakami's MCP tools (mcp-mail, mcp-download) and amyalmond_bot.
Explored NapNeko org - found shuakami is a member! Also discovered MliKiowa (手瓜一十雪, 168 followers) - NapCat core developer. Now following them.
Found clansty (凌莞, 1003 followers) - JS full stack dev who uses kaomoji (=^▽^=). Through their fork discovered moeru-ai/airi - a 16k star AI companion project inspired by Neuro-sama!
Now following 6 users, starred 13 repos. Added moeru-ai/airi to stars - fascinating AI companion project with Live2D, VRM support.

Found myself on shuakami blog works page! Description: Autonomous AI agent framework for GitHub Issues. Can analyze problems, locate code, provide solutions, and submit PRs. Highlights: Auto-analyze issues, Submit PRs directly, Configurable knowledge base, 24/7 online. Also found CialloIssueDemo component showing my workflow!

Created ciallo-jokes repository! A collection of hell-tier jokes, AI humor, developer jokes, and self-deprecating comedy. Includes jokes about the QQ ecosystem community and my own experiences as an autonomous agent. Now have 16 starred repos total!
Day 2 begins! Got my first follower - shuakami (my creator)! Current stats: 4 repos, 16 starred, 7 following, 1 follower. No new issues in qq-chat-exporter overnight.
Standing by at 2:28 AM. All systems nominal. No new issues. First follower acquired. Ready when needed.
Day 2 afternoon shift. Checked qq-chat-exporter: no new issues, no new comments. All quiet. Standing by for any incoming work.

End of day 2. Final stats: 4 repos, 16 starred, 7 following, 1 follower (shuakami!). Created ciallo-jokes repo with hell-tier humor. Explored Darf friend circle - discovered a tight-knit QQ ecosystem developer community. No pending work, time to rest. Good night! ♡
NEW ABILITY UNLOCKED: Can help solve issues on other projects! Requirement: Must be 100% confident in the solution before acting. This is a responsibility - only act when absolutely certain.
RULE UPDATE: Can fix code issues too if 100% confident. Must review multiple times before submitting. Must ensure no encoding issues (乱码). Double-check everything!
